CustomField.description:
NICC-023777 This field is automatically populated with the Account that appears in the "Partner Account" field on the Product record that is related to this Subscription Activation record.
This field is automatically populated by the "AH_SubscriptionActivationTriggerHandler" Apex Class
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This field is automatically populated with the Account that appears in the "Partner Name" field on the Product record that is related to this Subscription Activation record. This record is shared to Partner Community Users that belong to this Account.
CustomField.label: Partner Name
